definition: after liberation (i.e. after the Communist's victory)/after the establishment of PRC in 1949
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: Emancipation Park was originally a rich garden reverted to the government after the liberation.
sentences.chinese: 解放公園原是一處富家大花園，解放後收歸政府所有。

sentences.english: After liberation , great changes have taken place in the small town .
sentences.chinese: 解放後，小鎮發生了巨大的變化。

sentences.english: After the liberation of the so-called pharmaceutical companies is also a workshop.
sentences.chinese: 解放後所謂的中藥廠其實也是一個作坊。

sentences.english: We came off relief grain shortly after liberation.
sentences.chinese: 解放後不久，我們就不喫救濟糧了。

sentences.english: After the liberation, shenyang Tan Jie as a district party committee secretary of the position.
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽解放後，譚捷擔任區委書記一職。

sentences.english: After the liberation of Li Luo Huai died, his son diverted, the industry has no mass.
sentences.chinese: 解放後李洛懷過世，其子改行，其業遂不傳。

sentences.english: My father lived in Shanghai after liberation .
sentences.chinese: 解放後我父親住在上海。

sentences.english: After the liberation of all three provincial supply and use.
sentences.chinese: 解放後三家祠堂都爲供銷社使用。

sentences.english: After liberation highways were built into the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 解放後公路一直修進了山裏。

sentences.english: He was named director of the plant after liberation .
sentences.chinese: 解放後，他被任命爲這個廠的廠長。

sentences.english: He didn't return to his hometown until after liberation.
sentences.chinese: 他是解放後纔回到他家鄉的。

sentences.english: After Liberation the land issue in the old revolutionary base area of western Fujian was particularly pressing.
sentences.chinese: 全國解放後，閩西老革命根據地的土地問題特別突出。

sentences.english: In the newly liberated Peking he married his wife Jean.
sentences.chinese: 北京解放後不久，他在那裏與瓊結爲夫婦。

sentences.english: Agriculture in this country has developed greatly after liberation .
sentences.chinese: 解放後這個國家的農業得到了巨大的發展。

sentences.english: This situation has to be changed after the liberation.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的局面一直到解放後纔有所改變。

sentences.english: After Naboo was liberated, Bibble attended the parade celebrating the newfound freedom.
sentences.chinese: 納布解放後，比布爾參加了慶祝重獲自由的遊行。
